skills.name: Firecracker
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a bomb. The damage increases by 15% for each harmful effect on the enemy.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Multi-Firecracker
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times with a loud bomb. Each attack has a 25% chance to deal Continuous Damage and block beneficial effects for 2 turns.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Beneficial Effects Blocked
skill_effect.description: Buffs cannot be applied to the monster

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Magic Exterminator
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a bomb that blocks all magic powers, denying the usage of all skills with cooldowns for 2 turns. (Passive skills excluded)

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Silence
skill_effect.description: Skills with cooltime are blocked for a number of turns
